verbose_text: In the case of the VSL # 3 product, Biagioli recently [XREF_BIBR] failed to confirm that the Italy-made VSL # 3 is comparable to the US-made VSL # 3 for its protective action at the level of TJ [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], in terms of reduction of colitis [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR] and colonic inflammation [XREF_BIBR] in dextran sodium sulphate induced (DDS) treated mice and in Muc2 mucin deficient mice.
